@description.name: @description
@description.body:
This widget displays a menu. A dialog menu extends a popup and contains a list, which provides the user the possibility to select one value. The selected value is identified through selected index. Example 

 var model = new qx.data.Array(["item1","item2","item3"]);
 var menu = new qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Menu(model);
 menu.show();
 menu.addListener("changeSelection", function(evt){
    var selectedIndex = evt.getData().index;
    var selectedItem = evt.getData().item;
 }, this);

This example creates a menu with several choosable items.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: itemsModel {qx.data.Array ?}, the model which contains the choosable items of the menu.
@param.description: , the model which contains the choosable items of the menu.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: anchor {qx.ui.mobile.core.Widget ?} The anchor widget for this item. If no anchor is available, the menu will be displayed modal and centered on screen.
@param.description: The anchor widget for this item. If no anchor is available, the menu will be displayed modal and centered on screen.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the selection is changed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Class which is assigned to selected items. Useful for re-styling your menu via LESS.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Class which is assigned to unselected items. Useful for re-styling your menu via LESS.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Defines if the menu has a null value in the list, which can be chosen by the user. The label

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The label of the null value entry of the list. Only relevant when nullable property is set to true.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The selected index of this menu.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This value defines how much list items are visible inside the menu.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates the clearButton. Override this to customize the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates the scroll container for the selectionList. Override this to customize the widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: selectionList {qx.ui.mobile.list.List} The selectionList of this menu.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.ui.mobile.container.Scroll} the scroll container which contains the selectionList of this menu.
@return.description: the scroll container which contains the selectionList of this menu.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Getter for the scroll container which contains a @see {qx.ui.mobile.list.List} with the choosable items.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.ui.mobile.container.Scroll} the scroll container which contains the selectionList of this menu.
@return.description: the scroll container which contains the selectionList of this menu.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates the selection list. Override this to customize the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Getter for the selectionList of the menu.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handler for tap event on selection list.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the choosable items of the menu.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: itemsModel {qx.data.Array}, the model of choosable items in the menu.
@param.description: , the model of choosable items in the menu.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fires an event which contains index and data.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: evt {qx.event.type.Data}, contains the selected index number.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for tap on clear button.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Triggers (re-)rendering of menu items.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls the scroll wrapper of the selectionList to the item with given index.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer}, the index of the listItem to which the listScroller should scroll to.
@param.description: , the index of the listItem to which the listScroller should scroll to.

@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner.
